review: I would not recommended anyone to go visit Dr. Anil Vardani. Since he is a general physician, I took my grandfather to him for high cholesterol and limb pain.He wrote ********* test varying to Blood sugar test to MRI & Ecg. And since my grandfather was in pain so we got those tests done. But after showing him those reports, ** ****** *********** ** ** *** ********** ** **** *** ****** ** ***** ** *** *** **** ** *** ****** ******** **** ***** ******** ** **** ** *** ********** Also when we visited him second time, he made us wait for more than 30 mins because he was in 'Emergency room'.So kindly avoid this doctor *** ** ** ******* *** ******** ***** *** *** *********
